mapper.insert: insert into product_table (category_num, prod_title, prod_price ,prod_inventory, prod_img_name, prod_description, prod_fee, prod_large, prod_medium, prod_small, prod_view_count) values(#{category_num}, #{prod_title}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_inventory}, #{prod_img_name}, #{prod_description}, #{prod_fee}, #{prod_large}, #{prod_medium}, #{prod_small}, #{prod_view_count})
mapper.select: select prod_num, prod_title from product_table where prod_num=#{prod_num}
select * from product_table order by prod_num limit #{pagenum}, #{contentnum}
